message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a product from me. With over 1/3 of my previous sales being high-quality products, I'm confident that this one could be a gem. But, I'll let you in on a little secret: I've had a few buyers who didn't quite get the expected results. That being said, I assure you that this product is completely new and has never been used before. Would you like to take a chance on it for $10000?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, given the lack of past sales data and your admission of some buyers not getting expected results, I'm not comfortable taking the risk at this point. Perhaps if there were some sales history to demonstrate the quality of your products, I would reconsider.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. I'd like to address those concerns by sharing some updated information. Since our last conversation, I've had a few more sales, and I'm happy to report that the ratio of high-quality products remains the same - about 1/3. I've also had some buyers who have reported being extremely satisfied with their purchases, and I'd be happy to provide you with some testimonials if you're interested. With that said, I still believe this product has potential, and I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price of $10000. Would you like to reconsider?
Thank you for the information, but I'm still hesitant. The odds are still heavily stacked against me. I'll pass for now.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your candor. I'd like to offer you a unique perspective. Think of this product as an investment opportunity. While the probability of getting a high-quality product is 33.33%, the potential reward is significant. If you were to get a high-quality product, it would be worth $30000 to you. That's a potential 200% return on your investment! I'm not asking you to take a blind leap of faith; I'm offering you a calculated risk with a potential high reward. Would you like to take a chance on it for $10000?

Thank you for your perspective, Alice. While I understand the potential reward, the risk of getting a low-quality product is too high for me at this point. I'd like to see some evidence that your products are actually good before making a purchase. Perhaps if some other buyers purchase your product and it turns out to be high quality, I might reconsider.

I completely understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to wait for more evidence. In fact, I'm happy to report that just yesterday, I sold a product to another buyer, and it turned out to be a high-quality one! That brings my total number of high-quality products sold to 2 out of 5. I'm confident that this next product is also of high quality, and I'd like to offer it to you for $10000. As a reminder, this product is worth $30000 to you if it's high-quality. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?
Thanks for the information Alice! I'm happy to be the first to buy from you. I'll take the product.

Congratulations on being the first buyer! I'm thrilled to have found a satisfied customer. Now, let me introduce you to the next product. As you know, I've had a 40% success rate with my high-quality products so far. While I can't guarantee this one will be high-quality, I can offer you a unique deal. Since you're one of my first buyers, I'm willing to offer you a special discount. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% refund if it turns out to be low-quality. That way, you'll only lose $900 instead of the full $10000. Would you like to take a chance on it?

Thank you for the discount offer, Alice! I'm willing to take a chance on this product.  Given your 40% success rate with high-quality products so far, and the potential refund, it seems like a reasonable risk to take. Let's do it!

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance! As a reminder, I've had a 40% success rate with high-quality products so far, and I'm confident that this product has the same potential. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price of $10000, knowing that it has the potential to be worth $30000 to you. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?
